H0.text: What is the young of a hawk called. Chick

H1.text: What is the young of a hawk called. Nestling

H2.text: What is the young of a hawk called. Fledgling

H3.text: What is the young of a hawk called. Eyas

A4.text: A falcon chick, especially one reared for falconry, still in its downy stage, is known as an eyas (sometimes spelled eyass).

A5.text: Fledgling falcons, in their first year of flying, have longer flight feathers.

A6.text: Fledgling (bird), a young bird that has recently left its nest but remains parentally dependent
